alert.note: Alert for Teller County, Rampart Range above 7500fT, Pike's Peak Between 7500 And 11000 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 24 at 4:51PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Teller and northwestern El Paso Counties through 515 PM MDT... At 451 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Woodland Park, or 18 miles northwest of Colorado Springs, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of northeastern Teller and northwestern El Paso Counties. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Teller County, Rampart Range above 7500fT, Pike's Peak Between 7500 And 11000 Ft
